column4: anyone know how to get a source code package for ubuntu, and have it extracted with patches applied?
apt-get source packagename will get it... it won't apply the patches AFAIK, that'll only happen when you tell it to build - there might be a separate command to perform that step but it escapes me
to apply patches *AND* build, yes there is, it's "apt-get --build source packagename"
to apply patches and *NOT* build, i don't know
